summary.span: 允許以程式設計方式存取伺服器上的 HTML 項目。

span.span: Allows programmatic access to the HTML element on the server.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用控制項來建立選取方塊。Use the control to create a selection box. 指定控制項中的項目清單放入 HTML` 每個項目由物件。Each item is represented by a object. 若要指定每個項目在控制項中顯示的文字，您可以設定屬性的項目或只是將文字的開頭和結尾之間`To specify the text that is displayed for each item in the control, you can set the property of the item, or simply place text between the opening and closing ` 藉由設定項目的屬性，您可以將值與文字不同的項目。By setting the property of the item, you can associate a value with the item that is different from the text. 若要從清單中選取項目根據預設，設定屬性之項目的`true`。To select an item from the list by default, set the property of the item to `true`. 您可以控制的外觀和行為藉由設定控制和屬性。You can control the appearance and behavior of the control by setting the and properties. 屬性會指定控制項的高度 （以資料列）。The property specifies the height (in rows) of the control. 屬性會指定是否可以在同時選取多個項目控制項。The property specifies whether more than one item can be concurrently selected in the control. 根據預設，控制項顯示為下拉式清單方塊。By default, the control is displayed as a drop-down list box. 如果您允許多重選取 (藉由設定屬性`true`) 或指定大於一個資料列的高度 (藉由設定屬性設為大於值`1`)，顯示為清單方塊控制項。If you allow multiple selections (by setting the property to `true`) or specify a height greater than one row (by setting the property to a value greater than `1`), the control is displayed as a list box. 若要判斷選取的項目在單一選取控制，請使用屬性來取得選取之項目的索引。To determine the selected item in a single-selection control, use the property to get the index of the selected item. 您接著可以使用此值來擷取項目從集合。You can then use this value to retrieve the item from the collection. 若要判斷選取的項目從逐一查看控制項可讓多個選取項目，收集和測試每個項目的屬性。To determine the selected items from an control that allows multiple selections, iterate through the collection and test the property of each item. 類別提供兩個屬性，以支援資料繫結。The class provides two properties to support data binding. 若要將資料繫結會實作任何物件介面 (例如， ，和)，或介面，請使用屬性來指定要繫結至資料來源。To bind data to any object that implements the interface (such as , , and ), or the interface, use the property to specify the data source to bind to. 當您將屬性，您必須手動撰寫的程式碼來執行資料繫結。When you set the property, you must manually write the code to perform the data binding. 自動繫結控制權傳輸至資料來源代表資料來源控制項，使用屬性並將其值設定為使用資料來源控制項的屬性。To automatically bind an control to a data source represented by a data source control, use the property and set its value to the property of the data source control to use. 當您將屬性，控制項自動繫結至指定的資料來源控制項。When you set the property, the control automatically binds to the specified data source control. 因此，您不需要明確地呼叫方法。Therefore, you do not need to explicitly call the method. 您也可以指定資料來源中的哪些欄位繫結至和藉由設定控制項中項目的屬性和屬性，分別。You can also specify which fields in the data source bind to the and properties of an item in the control by setting the and properties, respectively. 如果資料來源包含多個資料來源，使用屬性來指定要繫結至控制項的特定來源。If the data source contains multiple sources of data, use the property to specify the specific source to bind to the control. 例如，如果您有物件多個資料表，您必須指定要繫結至控制項的表格屬性。For example, if you have a object with multiple tables, you must specify which table to bind to the control with the property. 如需執行個體的初始屬性值的清單，請參閱建構函式。For a list of initial property values for an instance of , see the constructor. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立藉由明確宣告出現在控制項中的項目控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to create an control by explicitly declaring the items that appear in the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[htmlselect#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/htmlselect/CS/htmlselectcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[htmlselect#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/htmlselect/VB/htmlselectvb.aspx#1)] 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立將控制項繫結至資料來源的控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to create an control by binding the control to a data source. [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlSelectDataSource#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlSelectDataSource/CS/htmlselectdatasourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlSelectDataSource#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlSelectDataSource/VB/htmlselectdatasourcevb.aspx#1)] 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性，以指定的資料來源控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify the data source for an control. 屬性設定為屬性控制項用來擷取資料。The property is set to the property of the control used to retrieve the data. 載入頁面時，控制項自動繫結至指定之資料來源控制項和資料顯示給使用者。When the page is loaded, the control automatically binds to the data source specified by the control and the data is displayed to the user. [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlSelect.DataSourceID#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlSelect.DataSourceID/CS/htmlselect.datasourceidcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlSelect.DataSourceID#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlSelect.DataSourceID/VB/htmlselect.datasourceidvb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來指定要繫結至資料來源控制項。Use the property to specify the data source to bind to the control. 資料來源必須實作的集合介面 (例如， ，或) 或介面。A data source must be a collection that implements either the interface (such as , , or ) or the interface. 當您將屬性，您必須手動撰寫的程式碼來執行資料繫結。When you set the property, you must manually write the code to perform data binding. 如果資料來源包含多組資料，例如物件使用多個資料表，請使用屬性來指定要繫結至控制項的資料集。If the data source contains multiple sets of data, such as a object with multiple tables, use the property to specify which data set to bind to the control. 您可以指定要繫結至資料來源的欄位和藉由設定控制項中的每個項目的屬性和屬性，分別。You can specify which fields from the data source to bind to the and properties of each item in the control by setting the and properties, respectively. 或者，您可以使用自動繫結到資料來源控制項所代表的資料來源的屬性。Alternately, you can use the property to automatically bind to a data source represented by a data source control. 當您將屬性，自動清單控制項的資料繫結至指定的資料來源控制項。When you set the property, the data listing control automatically binds to the specified data source control. 您不需要撰寫程式碼，明確地呼叫方法。You do not need to write code that explicitly calls the method. 如果兩個指定的值屬性和屬性，ASP.NET 會不能夠解析資料來源和擲回例外狀況。If values are specified for both the property and the property, ASP.NET is not able to resolve the data source and a exception is thrown. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性來指定要繫結資訊的來源控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify the source of information to bind to the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlSelectDataSource#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlSelectDataSource/CS/htmlselectdatasourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlSelectDataSource#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlSelectDataSource/VB/htmlselectdatasourcevb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性，以指定的繫結至資料來源欄位控制項中每個項目的屬性。Use the property to specify which field from the data source to bind to the property of each item in the control. 這個屬性通常用來提供值給屬性的值不同屬性。This property is commonly used to provide a value for the property that differs from the value of the property. 類別會提供兩個屬性，指定要繫結至資料來源。The class provides two properties for specifying the data source to bind to. 屬性可讓您將繫結控制項實作的任何集合或介面 (例如， ，或)。The property allows you to bind an control to any collection that implements the or interfaces (such as , , or ). 當您使用屬性來指定資料來源，您必須明確呼叫方法，以將控制項繫結及其到資料來源的屬性。When you use the property to specify the data source, you must explicitly call the method to bind the control and its property to the data source. 屬性可讓您將繫結代表資料來源的資料來源控制項的控制項。The property allows you to bind an control to a data source control that represents a data source. 當您使用屬性來指定資料來源，控制項及其屬性自動繫結至指定的資料來源控制項。When you use the property to specify the data source, the control and its property automatically bind to the specified data source control. 因此，您不需要明確地呼叫方法。Therefore, you do not need to explicitly call the method. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用和屬性，以指定要繫結至資料來源欄位屬性中的每個項目的控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to use the and properties to specify the field from the data source to bind to the property of each item in the control. remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會檢查是否在回傳資料的控制項不同於先前的值，以及如果是的話，會傳回`true`。The method checks whether the postback data of the control is different from its previous value, and if so, returns `true`. 如果控制項的屬性是`false`，表示單一選取控制項，然後在方法會檢查屬性。If the control's property is `false`, indicating a single-selection control, then the method checks the property. 如果控制項的屬性是`true`，指出多個選取項目控制項，然後在方法會檢查屬性。If the control's property is `true`, indicating a multiple-selection control, then the method checks the property. 主要由控制項開發人員擴充功能的使用方法控制項。The method is used primarily by control developers extending the functionality of the control.

summary.span: 從 方法所儲存的上一頁要求中，還原 控制項的檢視狀態資訊。

span.span: Restores the control's view state information from a previous page request that was saved by the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法主要供.NET Framework 基礎結構，並不是直接從您的程式碼使用。This method is used primarily by the .NET Framework infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code. 不過，控制項開發人員可以覆寫這個方法，以指定自訂的伺服器控制項如何還原其檢視狀態。However, control developers can override this method to specify how a custom server control restores its view state. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET 狀態管理概觀](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce)。For more information, see [ASP.NET State Management Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce). 控制項的檢視狀態儲存為物件。The control's view state is stored as a object. 欄位物件保存控制項的基底的檢視狀態。The field of the object holds the control's base view state. 欄位物件保存集合由屬性。The field of the object holds the collection represented by the property. 欄位物件會保存由所選取的索引屬性。The field of the object holds the selected indices represented by the property. 方法會呼叫基底類別的方法還原控制項的基底的檢視狀態。The method calls the base class's method to restore the control's base view state. 主要由控制項開發人員擴充功能的使用方法控制項。The method is used primarily by control developers extending the functionality of the control.

para.span: 在覆寫在衍生類別中，請務必呼叫基底類別的方法以便正確管理控制項的檢視狀態。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that the control's view state is properly managed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來指定是否可以在同時選取多個項目控制項。Use the property to specify whether multiple items can be concurrently selected in the control. 根據預設，控制項顯示為下拉式清單方塊。By default, the control is displayed as a drop-down list box. 如果您允許多重選取 (藉由設定屬性`true`) 或指定大於一個資料列的高度 (藉由設定屬性設為大於值`1`)，顯示為清單方塊控制項。If you allow multiple selections (by setting the property to `true`) or specify a height greater than one row (by setting the property to a value greater than `1`), the control is displayed as a list box. 若要判斷在選取的項目逐一查看控制項可讓多個同時選取項目，收集和測試每個項目的屬性。To determine the selected items in an control that allows multiple simultaneous selections, iterate through the collection and test the property of each item. > [!NOTE] > `multiple`屬性呈現在控制只有當這個屬性設定為`true`。The `multiple` attribute is rendered in the control only if this property is set to `true`. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性來指定多個項目是否可以選取在控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify whether multiple items can be selected in the control. remarks.format: ## Remarks 繫結至資料時，就會引發事件控制項。The event is raised when data is bound to the control. 這個方法會通知控制項執行與它相關聯的任何資料繫結邏輯。This method notifies the control to perform any data-binding logic that is associated with it. 具體來說，方法會建立從資料來源中指定的集合屬性或屬性。Specifically, the method creates the collection from the data source specified in either the property or the property. 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法也允許衍生類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 就會引發事件時選取的項目中控制發佈至伺服器之間的變更。The event is raised when the selected items in the control change between posts to the server. > [!NOTE] > 只有當使用者回傳至伺服器，例如起始送出按鈕，即可時，會引發這個事件。This event is raised only when the user initiates a post to the server, such as by clicking a Submit button. 這個事件不會發佈至伺服器。This event does not cause a post to the server to occur. > [!NOTE] > 控制項必須具有啟用檢視狀態事件才能正確運作。The control must have view state enabled for the event to work correctly. 您可以使用這個事件來執行資料驗證控制當使用者變更控制項中的選取項目。You can use this event to perform data validation on the control when the user changes the selection in the control. 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法也允許衍生類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何指定及程式碼的事件處理常式事件控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to specify and code an event handler for the event of the control. 此事件處理常式會判斷選取的項目是否彼此相容。The event handler determines whether the selected items are compatible with each other. remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性通常用來決定選取的項目在單一選取的索引控制項。The property is commonly used to determine the index of the selected item in a single-selection control. 這個索引可以再用來擷取項目從集合。This index can then be used to retrieve the item from the collection. 如果屬性設定為`true`，指出，可以同時選取多個項目，屬性包含的第一個選取的項目索引。If the property is set to `true`, indicating that multiple items can be concurrently selected, the property contains the index of the first selected item. 若要判斷選取的項目從逐一查看控制項可讓多個同時選取項目，收集和測試每個項目的屬性。To determine the selected items from an control that allows multiple simultaneous selections, iterate through the collection and test the property of each item. > [!CAUTION] > 很可能沒有任何選取的項目。It is possible to have no item selected. 如果未不選取任何項目，則屬性包含值為`-1`。If no item is selected, the property contains a value of `-1`. 當第一次載入頁面，並依預設不會選取項目，就會發生這種常發生。This commonly occurs when the page first loads and an item is not selected by default. 提供程式碼以測試這個值在參考中的項目之前集合。Provide code to test this value before referencing the item in the collection. 否則，如果索引超出範圍的集合，會擲回例外狀況。Otherwise, an exception is thrown if the index is out of the range of the collection. 根據預設，控制項顯示為下拉式清單方塊。By default, the control is displayed as a drop-down list box. 如果您允許多重選取 (藉由設定屬性`true`) 或指定大於一個資料列的高度 (藉由設定屬性設為大於值`1`)，顯示為清單方塊控制項。If you allow multiple selections (by setting the property to `true`) or specify a height greater than one row (by setting the property to a value greater than `1`), the control is displayed as a list box. 如果顯示下拉式清單方塊，會一律會選取項目。If a drop-down list box is displayed, an item is always selected. 如果顯示清單方塊，您可以藉由設定，以程式設計方式清除所有項目選取項目屬性`-1`。If a list box is displayed, you can programmatically clear the selection from all items by setting the property to `-1`. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性來判斷在選取之項目的索引控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to determine the index of the selected item in the control. 然後使用索引來擷取選取的項目從集合。The index is then used to retrieve the selected item from the collection. [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlSelectSingleSelect#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlSelectSingleSelect/CS/htmlselectsingleselectcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlSelectSingleSelect#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlSelectSingleSelect/VB/htmlselectsingleselectvb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 就會引發事件時選取的項目中控制發佈至伺服器之間的變更。The event is raised when the selected items in the control change between posts to the server. > [!NOTE] > 控制項必須具有啟用檢視狀態事件才能正確運作。The control must have view state enabled for the event to work correctly. 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何指定及程式碼的事件處理常式以宣告方式事件控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to specify and code an event handler declaratively for the event of the control. 此事件處理常式會判斷選取的項目是否彼此相容。The event handler determines whether the selected items are compatible with each other. [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlSelectOnServerChange#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlSelectOnServerChange/CS/htmlselectonserverchangecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlSelectOnServerChange#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlSelectOnServerChange/VB/htmlselectonserverchangevb.aspx#1)] 下列程式碼範例示範如何指定及程式碼的事件處理常式以程式設計方式事件控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to specify and code an event handler programmatically for the event of the control. 此事件處理常式會判斷選取的項目是否彼此相容。The event handler determines whether the selected items are compatible with each other. [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlSelectServerChange#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlSelectServerChange/CS/htmlselectserverchangecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlSelectServerChange#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlSelectServerChange/VB/htmlselectserverchangevb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 取得或設定 控制項的高度 (列數)。

span.span: Gets or sets the height (in rows) of the control.

value.span: 控制項的高度 (列數)。

span.span: The height (in rows) of the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性，以指定的高度 （以資料列）控制項。Use the property to specify the height (in rows) of the control. 如果您指定大小小於控制項中的項目數，捲軸會顯示可讓您在清單中上下移動。If you specify a size that is smaller than the number of items in the control, scroll bars are displayed to allow you to move up and down the list. 根據預設，控制項顯示為下拉式清單方塊。By default, the control is displayed as a drop-down list box. 如果您允許多重選取 (藉由設定屬性`true`) 或指定大於一個資料列的高度 (藉由設定屬性設為大於值`1`)，顯示為清單方塊控制項。If you allow multiple selections (by setting the property to `true`) or specify a height greater than one row (by setting the property to a value greater than `1`), the control is displayed as a list box. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性，以指定的高度 （以資料列）控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify the height (in rows) of the control. summary.span: 取得 控制項中所選取項目的值，或以指定的值將控制項的 屬性設定為清單中第一個項目的索引。

span.span: Gets the value of the selected item in the control or sets the property of the control to the index of the first item in the list with the specified value.

value.span: 在 控制項中選取項目的值。

span.span: The value of the selected item in the control.

value.span: 如果控制項中沒有選取的項目，則傳回 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性通常用來取得所參考之項目的值屬性。The property is commonly used to get the value of the item referenced by the property. > [!NOTE] > 如果控制項中沒有選取的項目，則傳回 。If no item is selected in the control, is returned. 如果您設定此屬性的值，屬性會更新為包含該值的清單中第一個項目的索引。If you set this property to a value, the property is updated with the index of the first item in the list that contains that value. 如果不找到任何相符的值，屬性保留不變。If no matching value is found, the property is left unchanged. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性取得選取的項目中的值控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to get the value of the selected item in the control.
